title: Schedule Carpet Cleaning for Unit Turnover
description: A unit is now vacant and needs carpet cleaning before the new tenant moves in. The manager must schedule a vendor.

tasks.description: Identify the vacant unit and verify that it requires carpet cleaning as part of the standard turnover process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the need for carpet cleaning.

tasks.description: Select a preferred carpet cleaning vendor and request a quote or schedule the service based on standard pricing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts an approved vendor to book the service.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the carpet cleaning and schedule it to be completed before the new tenant's move-in date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and schedules the work order correctly.
